While Soraka can be quite the annoying support if you walk in all of her Qs she is nothing compared to nami, who can take 1/3 of your health on reaching level 2 if you screw up your positioning for just a secound.

I do have ONE personal problem with supports actually, though.
And this is Mana. While riot forced carry mages to watch their mana, you have to be a first time league player to run out of mana as support.
Not only does your stating item give you enough mana reg. but ALL echanter items include mana reg.
I play Soraka every so often but her q is easy to dodge, and unless she is fed her ult doesn't heal too much.
